column1: Smoque BBQ////I am kicking myself for not going here sooner!  This is the best pulled pork anywhere
column2: really!  I am a freak about meat (like picky
column4: freak) and I would eat this delicious smokey pork every night of the week if I could.  The mac and cheese is amazing and the fresh cut fries are awesome.  My husband loves the St. Louis and baby back ribs from here- he said they're the best he's ever had- and we are bbq eating fools.  I haven't had anything from here that I don't love/crave.
